thread.title: US to end special status for Liberian immigrants: White House

author: cnbc.com
title: US to end special status for Liberian immigrants: White House
text:
US to end special status for Liberian immigrants: White House Special legal status for Liberian immigrants is set to end on March 31, 2019. Published 25 Mins Ago Reuters Paul J. Richards | AFP | Getty Images An international air traveler is cleared by a U.S. Customs and Border Protection Officer inside the U.S. Customs and Immigration area at Dulles International Airport. 
President Donald Trump said on Tuesday that special legal status for certain immigrants from Liberia, including Temporary Protected Status or Deferred Enforced Departure, will end on March 31, 2019. 
"Liberia is no longer experiencing armed conflict and has made significant progress in restoring stability and democratic governance," a White House memorandum quoted Trump as saying.
